article.title: List_of_classical_music_competitions
article.paragraph: European Classical music has long relied onmusic competitionsto provide a public forum that identifies the strongest players and contributes to the establishment of their professional careers. This is a list of currentcompetitionsinEuropean classical musicclassical music. Competitions offering a range of categories are listed under "General/mixed". Competitions with age restrictions are listed under "Young musicians".
